segments.text: I notice the water is just gushing out of the sink, and the woman doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so reckless, climbing up on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall and hurt himself, and it's going to be a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how irresponsible everyone is being in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and someone is going to slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to step in and take control of this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just so frustrating to watch everyone being so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman wakes up and notices what's going on before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
